CustomField.description: Satisfies criteria for UK Shipping Label? and HQ Shipping Label? nodes of the Consolidated Returns Process Builder. Evaluates Return Opportunity Shipping Country and returns the appropriate Shipping Label Origin
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "United States")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Canada")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Mexico")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Puerto Rico")) ), "VCK Shipping Label", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "United States")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Canada")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Mexico")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Puerto Rico")) ), "UK Shipping Label", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "United States"), ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Canada"), ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Mexico"), ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "Puerto Rico") ) ), "HQ Shipping Label", "DCL Shipping Label" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Return Shipping Label Origin
